ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Re: About Intel. and learning.....................
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the replys from everyone. after killing about 30 Griz. bears and Gian. Spiders (all con blue or light blue) My spear findly kicked in and I
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the replys from everyone. after killing about 30 Griz. bears and Gian. Spiders (all con blue or light blue) My spear findly kicked in and I starting learning Peirceing, about one point for every mob blue or higher. I used up most of my PP on so more armor so drifted over to Blackborrow for gnoll drops (being only 12th I found its the best way to make PP fast sofar.) and some Guy came along and took me on a whrll wind trip all over the place where everything con'ed  RED!! he buffed me and just helped with the kills and I went from 12th with one bubble to 13th at 50% in 1 hour.

Just my 2cp worth

Frezslice 13th circle Bar. Shaman
